timeline.message: [WFLY-13297] Provide the deployment's PropertyReplacer to WeldInjectionServices for its use in handling @Resource injection

timeline.bodyText: Couldn't we straight up remove this method? It's not any public API and within WFLY I only see a single usage that you already replaced.
timeline.author: manovotn

replies.bodyText:
If you're ok with removing it I'll do it in a separate PR.
I'm cautious about that kind of thing because some layered product might be doing odd things, but really I think using this method would have been unsupported hacking. But I expect this PR will be ported to EAP for bug fix branches so to be super-cautious I'll clean it up in a separate PR.
replies.author: bstansberry

replies.bodyText: I see what you mean, but I think we could remove it.
replies.author: manovotn
